attributes.action: Stop UK Banks from Blocking Cryptocurrency Withdrawals for Ordinary Citizens
attributes.additional_details:
This practice is not only unfair but also counterproductive. The government encourages citizens to pay capital gains tax on cryptocurrency profits; however, this becomes impossible if people cannot access their own funds.
We urge the relevant authorities to reconsider these restrictive policies and allow law-abiding citizens access to their rightfully earned money. This will promote financial inclusivity and uphold the principles of fairness that underpin our society.
attributes.background: UK banks are blocking ordinary citizens from withdrawing funds from registered cryptocurrency exchanges to their accounts. These individuals, who have already paid taxes on their income, have invested in cryptocurrency as a means of improving their future financial situation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign to following petition, which calls for the same action:

Prevent banks from banning transactions with Cryptocurrency Exchanges
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654841

We can also only accept petitions that include a full name.
